additionalDescription: Seems to be a very large dataset. Not as easily accessible as the others (need to download it with aws-cli). Unlabelled data.
annotationsType: Localisation of the recorder, and type of environment
license: Free for scientific study and exploration
locality: 50 sites in a 25km2 grid in the tropical rain forest in northern republic of congo (the  Nouabalé-Ndoki National Park)
name: Congo Soundscapes
